items.name: Calabar Enchanted Forest
items.short_description: A magical park where classic fairy tales come alive with interactive displays and character meet-and-greets. Children can wander through enchanted groves and discover beloved story scenes.

items.name: Whispering Woods Storyland
items.short_description: Experience a serene park dedicated to folk tales and fables, featuring gentle walking paths, whimsical sculptures, and designated areas for storytelling sessions. Perfect for younger children and peaceful exploration.

items.name: Princess & Knight Kingdom
items.short_description: A themed area where children can dress up as their favorite princesses or knights, participate in mock jousting, and explore a friendly castle. Imagination and role-playing are encouraged.
items.address: Eyo Ita Street, Off MCC Road, Calabar

items.name: Calabar Storybook Village
items.short_description: A charming miniature village designed to represent different storybook settings, from Hansel and Gretel's gingerbread house to Rapunzel's tower. Children can explore and play within these iconic scenes.

items.name: Calabar Splash Lagoon
items.short_description: A vibrant water park featuring multiple shallow pools, interactive splash pads, and gentle water slides perfect for younger children. Lifeguards are always on duty ensuring safety and fun.

items.name: Aqua Kids Paradise
items.short_description: This water park offers a variety of aquatic fun, from a lazy river designed for tubes to small wave pools and a dedicated toddlers' area. Shaded relaxation zones are available for parents.

items.name: Tropical Splashdown Park
items.short_description: A nature-inspired water park blending tropical aesthetics with exciting water features like a waterfall grotto, spray zones, and themed mini-slides. It's an immersive and refreshing experience.

items.name: Calabar River Rapids Junior
items.short_description: A unique water attraction offering scaled-down river rapids experience for children, complete with inflatable tubes and gentle currents. It simulates a natural river adventure in a safe environment.
items.address: Along Calabar River Banks, Ikot Omin

items.name: Calabar Young Scientists Lab
items.short_description: An interactive science center designed to spark curiosity in children through hands-on experiments, engaging demonstrations, and discovery zones covering physics, chemistry, and biology basics.

items.name: Innovation Kids Hub Calabar
items.short_description: Focuses on technology and engineering with age-appropriate robotics workshops, coding games, and construction challenges. Encourages problem-solving and creative thinking in a fun environment.

items.name: Eco-Kids Discovery Center
items.short_description: An environmental science center where children learn about nature, ecology, and sustainability through interactive exhibits, a mini-garden, and animal encounters. Promotes environmental awareness.
items.address: By Calabar Botanical Garden, Asari Eso

items.name: Cosmic Kids Observatory
items.short_description: A small, kid-friendly observatory and planetarium offering simplified explanations of the solar system, stars, and galaxies. Features engaging visual shows and telescope viewing sessions (weather permitting).

items.name: Calabar Fables & Folktales Garden
items.short_description: A serene garden park with designated storytelling corners where local and international folktales are brought to life by professional storytellers. Features interactive exhibits based on popular narratives.
items.address: Along State Housing Estate Road, Calabar

items.name: Echoing Tales Amphitheater
items.short_description: An outdoor amphitheater setting where vibrant storytelling performances, puppet shows, and dramatic readings captivate young audiences. Special events and guest storytellers are regular features.

items.name: Mythical Creatures Story Path
items.short_description: A winding path through a decorated park, where each stop reveals a new mythical creature from Nigerian and global lore, accompanied by a short audio story or a live storyteller.

items.name: Storyteller's Grand Treehouse
items.short_description: A unique storytelling space built around a large, ancient tree, offering cozy nooks and a central stage for intimate storytelling sessions. Encourages children to share their own tales.

items.name: Calabar Junior Magicians Guild
items.short_description: A dedicated venue offering daily magic and illusion shows tailored for children, featuring local magicians and interactive segments where kids can learn simple tricks.

items.name: Mystical Mirage Theater
items.short_description: A specialized theater showcasing grand illusions and captivating magical acts that will astound children and adults alike. Features advanced techniques and dazzling presentations.

items.name: The Great Calabar Conjurer's Den
items.short_description: An intimate setting where close-up magic and mentalism tricks are performed right before the children's eyes. Encourages audience participation and leaves kids amazed by the seemingly impossible.

items.name: Enchanted Puppet & Magic Theatre
items.short_description: Combines the charm of puppet shows with magical elements, creating a unique theatrical experience. Stories unfold with magical twists and surprise illusions, delighting younger audiences.

items.name: Calabar Kiddie Coasters & Carousel
items.short_description: A classic amusement park section dedicated to younger thrill-seekers, featuring a gentle kiddie roller coaster, a beautifully themed carousel, and miniature Ferris wheel.

items.name: Adventure Junction Arcade
items.short_description: Beyond just rides, this park offers a mix of classic amusement rides like bumper cars and teacups, combined with an indoor arcade featuring redemption games and virtual reality experiences for older kids.

items.name: Cross River Funfair Grounds
items.short_description: A vibrant funfair offering seasonal and permanent carnival rides, including swings, a mini-drop tower, and various skill games. Perfect for a lively family outing.

items.name: Toddler Town Express
items.short_description: A miniature train ride that takes toddlers and their parents on a scenic journey through a themed landscape. Features gentle movements and delightful visual attractions suitable for very young children.

items.name: Calabar Dino Explorers Park
items.short_description: Step back in time to the Mesozoic era! This park features life-sized animatronic dinosaurs, fossil digging sites, and an educational museum for aspiring paleontologists.

items.name: Jurassic Creek Adventure
items.short_description: An immersive adventure through a simulated prehistoric jungle, where children can spot various dinosaur species in their 'natural habitat.' Includes a small jeep ride and a discovery trail.

items.name: Dino Dig & Play Zone
items.short_description: A hands-on play area where children can unearth 'dinosaur bones' in a giant sandpit, climb on dinosaur-themed play structures, and learn about different species in a fun way.

items.name: T-Rex Roar & Ride Experience
items.short_description: Offers a thrilling but safe virtual reality ride that takes children on an encounter with a T-Rex. Also includes a simulator ride and photo opportunities with static dinosaur models.

items.name: Calabar Explorer's Maze
items.short_description: A large, outdoor maze with interactive challenges and riddles at each turn. Children follow clues to find a hidden treasure, promoting teamwork and problem-solving skills.
items.address: Off Ndidem Usang Iso Road, Calabar

items.name: Jungle Quest Park
items.short_description: An adventure park set in a natural jungle-like environment, offering age-appropriate obstacle courses, zip lines (miniature), and nature scavenger hunts. Fosters physical activity and exploration.

items.name: Pirate's Treasure Island Challenge
items.short_description: A themed adventure zone where children embark on a pirate-themed quest, solving puzzles, navigating 'seas,' and searching for hidden treasure. Interactive characters guide the journey.

items.name: Enigma Escape Room Junior
items.short_description: Specially designed escape rooms for children, featuring fun themes, age-appropriate challenges, and engaging storylines. Perfect for small groups to solve mysteries together.

items.name: Calabar Wonderland Park
items.short_description: A classic children's theme park with multiple themed zones, including a fantasy land, a wild west town, and a futuristic city. Offers a mix of gentle rides, shows, and character greetings.

items.name: African Safari Kids Resort
items.short_description: A unique theme park experience focused on African wildlife and culture, featuring safari-themed rides, animal-themed play areas, and educational shows about various animals.

items.name: Sweet Tooth Land
items.short_description: A whimsical, candy-themed theme park where everything is designed to look like sweets and desserts. Features brightly colored rides, a 'chocolate river' boat ride, and a candy-making workshop.

items.name: Tiny Town Builders Park
items.short_description: A construction-themed park where children can operate miniature diggers, build with giant blocks, and navigate a scaled-down road system in electric cars. Encourages creativity and hands-on play.

items.name: Calabar Fun Factory
items.short_description: A large indoor play center featuring multi-level soft play structures, ball pits, slides, and climbing frames. Designed for children of all ages to burn energy in a safe environment.

items.name: Bounce & Beyond Zone
items.short_description: Specializes in inflatable bounce houses, trampolines, and obstacle courses, all within an air-conditioned indoor space. Perfect for high-energy play regardless of the weather.

items.name: Creative Kids Corner Calabar
items.short_description: An indoor play center focusing on creative and imaginative play, with dress-up areas, building blocks, art stations, and a miniature pretend-play town (e.g., hospital, market, fire station).

items.name: Mini-City Exploration Hub
items.short_description: A miniature city where children can role-play various adult professions and scenarios, complete with scaled-down shops, roads, and interactive exhibits. It's an educational and fun experience.
